A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It’s a very uneven film. They came up with some great plot points but really botched all the moments in between. Some of the CGI is not very good at all (whenever someone rides on top of something and when Poe slides into a ditch). None of the creatures felt like they were actually in the scene. For me\, all the scenes with Rey\, Kylo and Luke were really good. However\, all the scenes with Fin\, Poe and Leia were so bad that I audibly groaned about 3 times. I think the people giving it 1 star are doing so based off of their level of disappointment. It’s nowhere near as bad as the prequels\, but doesn’t even come remotely close to The Force Awakens or Rogue One.
